ovdesc.p: This is a live table updated by the system. The id to the record is the customer number of thejoint/beneficial owner from the FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO.

desc.p: This field holds the id to the FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO record where this customer has been entered as a joint holder.
System generated value, valid id to a FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO record
The id to the FATCA.ROLE.CUSTOMER record is the Customer number of the joint holder.
Must be a valid customer from the Customer application.
